post.body: we haven't done any yet but I will let you know. Vargas is speaking to the entire conf at the moment.
not really crazy dreams, just weird sleeping on a mound of way too much pillow.
problem with scissors is they can get up and walk away.
8 drinks of what? Water? You're not drinking enough, obviously.
@bkurzius wish you were here. Dinner time chaos now, where on way to do x you get distracted by 20 people you haven't seen in ages
the TV in the room actually broadcasts the talks downstairs, but I'm currently being held hostage by a Cartoon Network holiday special
we're attending ours this weekend as well
no signals nearby that work <sob>
just $10. I'll sell 10 photos to cover it.
had to open Safari just to pay durned fee, then got back to FF only to find all tabs still belonged to hotel. So much for blogging.
it is nice. Looks very pretty today. Changes in temp and the effect of cars on it all will change that shortly
it's possible the one of the cops was riding Fatty Lumpkin, yes. Newspaper article at least one major fact wrong, so can't be sure.
tee hee. Sorry to hear the consistency isn't right...
I'm sure the gingerbread house has at least 3 food groups in it. You're all set.
shoveling in the dark is more fun too... right
lol yes and in uniform.
yes and happily so for some.
wow, 14" somewhere in the Hartford area? Crazy
I'd be glad to if you lived next door :)
yeah... but rarely
yep, lightning and thunder here too. Kids are totally, thoroughly freaked and excited
congrats!
it's amusing but also really awful because it's the freaking paper of record
geez. How hard is that to fact-check? Guessing not all that tough if it didn't take you all day.
prefer a translation something along the lines of, "Whale of the fail."
nice, a TED talk! Wonder why she doesn't mention Baha'i Faith. Point re the Golden Rule is in Baha'i texts. Her points are good!
weird, I've only heard of this phishing scam as of today. Wonder what that was about.
scam going through Facebook? What are you seeing there? Curiouser and curiouser...
some suggest you might let the person know his/her account was compromised, and to change password.
they were; it's a scam of some kind. Twitter has message on home page about it.
maybe we got ours from the same person. (I had the same reaction as you)
happy new year to you as well!
agreed! And I think a lot of other casting choices have been great, so no strong reason why this wouldn't fit. Looking forward to it
do you know if previous Doctors had much of a track record? Wonder if that's an asset for the show, or a liability.
so what do you think of the pick? He certainly seems like an unusual fellow, with lots of hand-motioning in his interview.
I love that movie. Thanks for reminding me of it... :D
a long-time sci fi BBC show. http://www.bbc.co.uk/doctorwho/
he's the new Doctor Who, just announced
that sounds horrendous. On the bright side, it wasn't you doing the puking. Then again, maybe that would've relieved sinus pressure
okay, fair enough.
just bought Aperture 2 and can't wait to take it for a spin. You've been happy with it?
Met, talked for 30 mins with long time co-editor and writer colleague Aaron Emmel. We were meeting in person for the first time.
Packed ballroom last night http://twitpic.com/ssqd and men who drummed and sang (much other entertainment as well) http://twitpic.com/ssqo
Vargas talking about great things Holyoke Baha'i community is doing. Represent! Anis Roohi (from Hyoke) band performed last night here btw
Counsellor Gerardo Vargas at conf said 2,000+ attending. Quoting late Rebequa Murphy, "let only death or sickness prevent you from going"
Tony Mateus has pretty pictures (as usual) of recent ice storm in western Mass. http://tinyurl.com/5nxm4p
Awake, showered, dressed, drinking coffee. The pillows at this hotel are the size of small mountains. Interesting sleep. Daughter still gone
Sending daughter to sleep in another hotel room because Sheraton ran out of rollaway beds. Fortunately, her grandmother is here, with space.
Watching a fabulous slideshow depicting lovely images taken recently of people in prayer and education classes all over the globe.
Stylish but cheap desk in my room at the Sheraton sways side to side on narrow little plank legs. Feel like I'm in a seafaring vessel. Ahoy!
Looking at the puppetry work on FB resulting from @juliedixon and @astridiana's afternoon artistic exploits today. Nice work ladies
View from my snowy window this morning: http://twitpic.com/ujlm It's snowing again but only for a bit. Daughter brought me coffee in bed :)
Reading @luiscotto's post about the last City Council meeting http://is.gd/cCoH and wondering what it would take to appropriate the cash...
TV news reporting 8" of snow in Hartford area so far.
Time to shovel or something. See what's the haps on the street.
Kids are sledding in the backyard darkness. Hope no one comes in bleeding. Even if they do, it'll have been worth it to them, methinks
New phishing scam DM says site with your picture on it, link not Blogspot but twitterblog.access-logins.com instead. Be warned
The phishing scam DM came to me from someone I know. Does that mean her account was somehow hacked and used for the purpose? Nasty.
Having a super day but all this superness is somehow giving me a headache. How does that happen? Better pull back on the superosity.
Enjoyed some impromptu maki and miso with @juliedixon, Shane and @astridiana this evening. Missed @mirahartford though.
